data.chText: 人口中的一大部分 / 重要部分
data.enText: a substantial/significant portion of the population

data.chText: 购书只占预算的一小部分。
data.enText: Only a small portion of the budget is spent on books.
The central portion of the bridge collapsed.
an amount of food that is large enough for one person

data.chText: 她把蛋糕切成了六小份。
data.enText: She cut the cake into six small portions.

data.chText: 分享的部分；分担的责任
data.enText: a part of sth that is shared with other people

data.chText: 你必须承担这次危机的一部分责任。
data.enText: You must accept a portion of the blame for this crisis.
to divide sth into parts or portions

data.chText: 这个工厂每天分装12 000多份饭食。
data.enText: The factory portions and packs over 12 000 meals a day.

data.chText: 土地已分给了各个家族。
data.enText: Land was portioned out among the clans.

simple_means.memory_skill: port 部分；分开 + ion 表名词 → 部分

ex.chText: 他的车的前部已经清洗过了。
ex.enText: The front part of his car was washed.

ex.chText: 在该国的部分地区，人们至少会说两种语言。
ex.enText: In parts of that country, people can speak at least two languages.

ex.chText: 部分利润将捐给慈善机构。
ex.enText: Part of the profit will be donated to charity.

ex.chText: 假期里最开心的事情就是滑雪。
ex.enText: The best part of the holiday was the skiing.

synonyms.bx: 最普通用词，指物体、地区、事件、时间等的一部分或特征之一。

ex.chText: 警方找到了几片陶器碎片。
ex.enText: Police found several fragments of broken pottery.

ex.chText: 我听到了他们谈话的片段。
ex.enText: I heard a fragment of their conversation.

synonyms.bx: 指从较大物体上断裂或脱落的小块碎片，或谈话、新闻等的片段。

ex.enText: The front portion of the bridge collapsed.

ex.chText: 很大一部分财产归了约翰。
ex.enText: A large portion of the property went to John.

ex.chText: 食物的花费只占预算的一小部分。
ex.enText: Only a small portion of the budget was spent on food.

synonyms.bx: 尤指某事物中可与其他部分区分开来的部分。

ex.chText: 乘客只能在吸烟区吸烟。
ex.enText: Passengers are allowed to smoke only in the smoking section.

ex.chText: 交通繁忙的路段配备了两名交警。
ex.enText: There are two traffic police in the busy section of road.

ex.chText: 他们订购的家具是分装运送的。
ex.enText: The furniture they ordered was transported to them in sections.

synonyms.bx: 指物体、地方等划分出的部分，也可指结构、家具等整体中的部分。

tr: the allotment of some amount by dividing something
example: death gets more than its share of attention from theologians

tr: something less than the whole of a human artifact
example: the rear part of the house

tr: an individual quantity of food or drink taken as part of a meal
example: his portion was larger than hers
there's enough for two servings each

tr: money or property brought by a woman to her husband at marriage
assets belonging to or due to or contributed by an individual person or group
example: he wanted his share in cash

tr: something determined in relation to something that includes it
example: he wanted to feel a part of something bigger than himself
I read a portion of the manuscript
the smaller component is hard to reach

tr: your overall circumstances or condition in life (including everything that happens to you)

value.def: A portion of something is a part of it.

example.ex: Damage was confined to a small portion of the castle...
example.tran: 城堡仅有一小部分受损。

example.ex: I have spent a fairly considerable portion of my life here...
example.tran: 我生命中相当长的一段时光是在这里度过的。

example.ex: I had learnt a portion of the Koran...
Insurance can represent a significant portion of the total price of a holiday.
example.tran: 度假总费用里保险费可能会占据相当大的一部分。

value.def: A portion is the amount of food that is given to one person at a meal.

example.ex: Desserts can be substituted by a portion of fresh fruit...
example.tran: 餐后甜点可以用一份新鲜水果代替。

example.ex: ...fish and chips at about £2.70 a portion.

partsOfSpeech.dec: de 去掉 + port 拿，运 → 拿出去 → 放逐
ex 出 + port 拿，运 → 运出〔港口〕→ 出口
im 进入 + port 拿，运 → 进入〔港口〕→ 进口
port 拿，运 + able 能…的 → 能拿的 → 便携式的
port 拿，运 + age 表费用；表行为或行为的结果 → 搬运；运费
port 拿，运 + er 表名词 → 搬运工
port 拿，运 + foli 树叶，引申为页 + o 表物 → 可装运书页的东西 → 文件夹
sup 下 + port 运 → 从下面运送 → 支持
trans 转移 + port 拿，运 → 从一个地方拿到另一个地方 → 运输
ap 加强 + port 部分；分开 + ion 表动作 → 把整体分开 → 分配
dis 不 + proportion 比例 + al …的 → 不成比例的
port 部分；分开 + ion 表名词 → 部分
pro 在前 + port 部分；分开 + ion 表名词 → 按之前的量分开 →〔所占〕比例
